alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 12:24PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...Showers with strong gusty winds will impact portions of Hawaii in Hawaii County through 200 PM HST... At 1222 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking showers with strong gusty winds 14 miles southwest of Kahaluu-Keauhou, or 15 miles southwest of Kailua-Kona, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kailua-Kona, Captain Cook, Waikoloa Village, Puuanahulu, Honaunau, Kahaluu-Keauhou, Kainaliu, Honalo, Kealakekua, Kalaoa, Holualoa, Puako, Kohala Ranch, Hawaiian Ocean View, Kamuela, Pohakuloa Training Area, Kona International Airport, Milolii, Waikoloa Beach and Mauna Lani. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Kohala; Kona
